snippet.title: Shujinkou - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Shujinkou (主人公, shoe-jeen-co) is an in-development Japanese role playing game that focuses on story and gameplay while allowing players to learn and use Japanese to save the world and defeat the 'Akuma'. Targeting the PC, PS4, and Nintendo Switch, Shujinkou will facilitate learning Japanese in its main story from JLPT N5 to N3 standards. We have designed Shujinkou so that those who are native or fluent in the language will have an equally, if not more fulfilling, experience using a language they have complete command of in this 50+ hour epic. 

Our Studio Website: https://www.ricegames.net
Shujinkou Website: https://www.shujinkou.net
We're on STEAM! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1386630
🚨Note: We will be launching a BRAND NEW website with new content in August 2020. 

🚨 Check out our social media below! 🚨
🔥 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ProjectShujinkou
🌊 Twitter: https://twitter.com/RiceGames
⚡ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rice.games
💨 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/shujinkou

With an art style influenced by modern JRPGs and a modernized style of Ukiyo-e, a Music Team led by Brian LaGuardia, a formal apprentice to The Avengers' Alan Silvestri, and Programmers that attended prestigious universities like UCLA, Stanford, Cornell and have work experience at companies including Panasonic, Unity, and Microsoft, the team at RICE GAMES is gearing up to provide the ultimate language-infused gaming experience to gamers around the world that are passionate about everything Japanese!

「主人公」はPC・PS4・Nintendo Switch対応する、現在開発中の日本語学習JRPGだ。アクマを倒すためにJLPT N5からN3までの日本語を学び、バトルや迷宮などに使用。「主人公」はケームプレイ・ストーリーにこだわっていて、日本語のネイティブ・流暢なゲーマーでも、日本語学習中のゲーマーと同様に50時間以上の冒険を楽しむことができる。MARVELアベンジャーズの作曲家・ Alan Silvestriの元学生である音楽監督・一流の大学 (UCLA, Stanford, Cornell)の卒業生・Panasonic, Unity, Microsoftなどの経歴があるプログラマーが、数年間RICE GAMESで努力とパッションを込めて、現代的JRPGと現代的浮世絵のアートスタイルを備えた究極の言語学習ゲームを、日本に興味を持つ世界中の人たち・日本人たちに向けて開発中。
